data.event: The population is 8,388 as recorded by the 2010 census.

event.title: established by John P. Millett and William McKay, in 1882

data.event: Burlington began as a logging camp, established by John P. Millett and William McKay, in 1882.
It was officially incorporated on June 16, 1902.
In 2007, the city opened a new library and city hall.

event.title: Today, Fairhaven Avenue is the center of Burlington's old downtown, and provides

data.event: Today, Fairhaven Avenue is the center of Burlington's old downtown, and provides a gathering place for the whole city during the annual summer Berry Dairy Days.
Berry Dairy Days was originally simply known as the Strawberry Festival, and served as a fundraiser for the town's fire department for many years.

event.title: served as a fundraiser for the town's fire department for many years

data.event: Berry Dairy Days was originally simply known as the Strawberry Festival, and served as a fundraiser for the town's fire department for many years.

A 1954 article described a gigantic strawberry shortcake that was the centerpiece of that year's festival: it consisted of 60 sheets of sponge cake that took 12 hours to bake, and claimed to be the largest strawberry shortcake in the world.
